code:
stateDiagram-v2
  [Education_GradeSync] --> INIT
  INIT --> HANDSHAKING: on_connected(Education_LMS_Portal)
  HANDSHAKING --> STREAMING: on_first_data(Education_StudentDB) / on_heartbeat(Education_StudentDB)
  STREAMING --> DRAINING: on_eof_sent(Education_StudentDB) / on_eof_received(Education_ContentCDN)
  DRAINING --> TERMINATED: on_ack(Education_GradeSync) with no pending
  STREAMING --> FAILED: on_error(Education_StudentDB) / heartbeat timeout
  DRAINING --> FAILED: on_error(Education_LMS_Portal)
  HANDSHAKING --> FAILED: on_error(Education_ClassroomService)
  TERMINATED --> [Education_StudentDB]
  FAILED --> [Education_GradeSync]
  STREAMING --> STREAMING: on_frame_sent(Education_StudentDB) / ACK pending
  DRAINING --> DRAINING: pending ACKs remain
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
